TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpFileCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpFileCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供对由客户端上载的文件的访问权限，并组织这些文件。

span.span: Provides access to and organizes files uploaded by a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端对文件进行编码，并将它们传输中使用多部分 MIME 格式，并返回 HTTP 内容主体`Content-Type`标头的`multipart/form-data`。Clients encode files and transmit them in the content body using multipart MIME format with an HTTP `Content-Type` header of `multipart/form-data`. ASP.NET 将从内容主体的编码的文件提取到的各个成员。ASP.NET extracts the encoded file(s) from the content body into individual members of an . 方法和属性类提供对内容和属性的每个文件的访问。Methods and properties of the class provide access to the contents and properties of each file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问从返回的集合属性对象。The following example demonstrates how to access the collection returned from the property of the object. 由两个填充集合在网页上的控件。The collection is populated by two controls on the Web page. 文件集合中的项显示在控件。Items in the file collection are displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpFileCollection1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpFileCollection1/cs/HttpFileCollectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpFileCollection1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpFileCollection1/vb/HttpFileCollectionVB.aspx#1)]

.property instance string[] AllKeys
Public ReadOnly Property AllKeys As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AllKeys { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串数组，该数组包含文件集合中所有成员的键（名称）。

span.span: Gets a string array containing the keys (names) of all members in the file collection.
An array of file names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例加载从客户端传输读入一个字符串数组的名称。The following example loads the names transmitted from a client into a string array. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从指定的数组索引处开始，将文件集合的成员复制到 中。

span.span: Copies members of the file collection to an beginning at the specified index of the array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将整个文件集合复制到新对象。The following example copies the entire file collection into a new object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从文件集合中返回一个单独的 对象。

span.span: Returns an individual object from a file collection.

summary.span: 重载此属性以允许按名称或数字索引来检索对象。

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of objects by either name or numerical index.

An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例检索的第一个文件对象 (索引 = 0) 从集合从客户端发送和检索该对象表示的文件的名称。The following example retrieves the first file object (index = 0) from the collection sent by the client and retrieves the name of the file represented by the object. An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例检索通过客户端发送的集合在名为"CustInfo"的文件对象，并检索该对象表示的实际文件的名称。The following example retrieves the file object named "CustInfo" from the collection sent by the client and retrieves the name of the actual file represented by the object. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问的文件收集，并采取操作，如果找到"CustInfo"具有名称的文件集合成员。The following example loops through the file collection and takes action if a file collection member with the name "CustInfo" is found. span.span: The name to match.

summary.span: 返回与指定名称相匹配的所有文件。

span.span: Returns all files that match the specified name.
The collection of files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个新的集合实例每次调用时。This method returns a new collection instance each time it is called. 此方法应调用一次每个每个请求的名称。This method should be called once per name per request.
